home.description: Download the most popular online dating mobile app from app store or google store. Let's have a try

hero.title: MOST TRUSTED & SECURE
hero.description: Disappointed with current dating apps. Good for us too. Be among the first to join the BIM community and benefit from 3 months free to discover our features.

article.title: About Us

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description:
We too have been on dating apps, we too have lots of stories to tell (good and bad) and like you we said to ourselves that sending text messages on apps in 2024 was a bit has been. And we're not even talking about the exorbitant price offered on the market. 

At BIM, we believe that we can change the order established by the market behemoths. We thought about what we would like to see in a dating app and here is what came out:
- **More authenticity**: The fake profile, the profile photo that does not reflect reality, the lies about the physical appearance... it's fun for 5 minutes, but in the long run it becomes boring. The video allows you to see live if the charm works.
- **More instantaneity**: Thank you but waiting for the other person's response that will come we don't know when... no thanks. Here again, the video solves the problem of live discussions to know in 15 minutes if you want to go further or not.
- **More security**: We have all heard horrible stories about meetings that went badly. Socializing, looking for love or fun should never be a cause for concern. Here again we have focused on security with a community moderation system coupled with an algorithm that filters out unhealthy people.

So yes, the video can be intriguing, but deep down what is better? Fantasizing about 3 photos and wasting 3 hours of your time before potentially being disappointed during a date or launching a video meeting from the start and seeing if the charm works?

On the pricing side, we have also tried to be as fair as possible. Already if you are among the first thousand to pre-register, it is free for 3 months. Otherwise you can sponsor your friends. Here again this gives you free access to BIM for a limited time. Finally, when the time comes, if you are happy with us, you will be able to subscribe to a premium subscription for the price of a Netflix subscription.

ourConcept.title: Our Concept
ourConcept.description:
**Video for authentic encounters:**

 BIM is the meeting of a social network and a dating application. Discover a new universe built around video for more authentic encounters. We have created a space where you can be yourself and meet people according to your desires. No more misleading profiles and endless conversations via messages that lead nowhere. With BIM, you will be able to directly interact, hear and feel the true personality of the other from the beginning of your meetings. Our AI-based algorithm is designed to offer you experiences that will best match your expectations while learning from your past experiences.

The cherry on the cake is that we have added lots of features that will make your life easier in the application, but we'll let you discover them for yourself.

 **An AI based on behavioral analysis that takes into account each of your experiences:** 

 We have worked a lot on how to develop an AI that could reproduce dating situations as close to reality as possible. In real life, when you meet someone, you are attracted both by their appearance and their personality. Our behavioral AI takes into account interactions in the app to offer you people with affinities and values â€‹â€‹that are closest to yours based on your past experiences. The more time you spend in BIM, the more refined profiles the AI â€‹â€‹will offer you. 

 **A commitment to greater inclusivity:** 

 At BIM we are convinced that each person should be able to interact according to their choices and desires. Our platform is designed so that each gender has free access to the application in a caring and safe environment. At BIM, there is no discrimination or neglect of minorities. Make yourself comfortable, we'll take care of the rest. 

 **Security, the cornerstone of our concept:** 

 For us, security is our top priority. We have implemented robust security measures to ensure that every interaction on our platform is safe and enjoyable. We have implemented community moderation with strict rules that will exclude any user who is not in line with our ethical charter.

As a user, you can report any inappropriate or suspicious behavior. We believe in the power of the community to maintain a respectful and caring environment. 

 **Our watchwords: Kindness and tolerance:** 

 We've said it before but we'll say it again: we come here to have a good time and share. Kindness. Tolerance and openness to others allow us to meet great people and discover new horizons. 

So if you don't want to be tempted by our experience, we won't hold it against you. But don't stop others. We hope you find what you're looking for ðŸ˜Š

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Sign up and be among the first to join the BIM community. The first 1000 will receive a free subscription for 3 months.

hero.title: CONTACT
hero.description:
Do you have a question, an idea for improvement or a point that you would like to bring to our attention? Our contact form below has been provided for this purpose.

You can also contact us by Whatsapp or send us a scented envelope to the address below.

We are committed to responding to all messages as quickly as possible, always with good humor and kindness.

ourConceptDetails.title: Our Concept
ourConceptDetails.subtitle: Concept Subtitle
ourConceptDetails.description: This is the full description of our concept.

section1.title: Lorem IPSUM modified
section1.description:
**BIM** (Better International Match) is a **global** dating app connecting singles worldwide. It uses advanced matching algorithms, supports multiple languages, and ensures user safety through rigorous verification.

Features include text, voice, and video communication, cultural exchange, and travel planning. BIM offers both free and premium plans, fostering a supportive community and meaningful cross-cultural connections.

section2.title: News Heading
section2.description:
# Better International Match

![BIM Logo](/favicon.png)

**Better International Match (BIM)** is a global dating app connecting singles worldwide. It uses advanced matching algorithms, supports multiple languages, and ensures user safety through rigorous verification.

Features include:
- Text, voice, and video communication
- Cultural exchange
- Travel planning

BIM offers both free and premium plans, fostering a supportive community and meaningful cross-cultural connections. 

![Unsplash](https://plus.unsplash.com/premium_photo-1676667573156-7d14e8b79ad3?q=80&w=2070&auto=format&fit=crop&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D)

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.description: This legal notice applies to the entire contents of this website under the domain name www.bim-dating.com (hereinafter 'the Site'). Please read this legal notice carefully before browsing the Site. By accessing the Site, you unreservedly accept the following provisions.

articles.title: THE PUBLISHER
articles.description: The publishing of the Site is ensured by Bim Group SARL-S with capital of 10,000 euros, registered with Luxembourg Trade and Companies Register under number 123456 whose head office is located at 36, route du succes, Telephone number 0427827257, Email address: contact@bim-dating.com. Intracommunity VAT number: 737286369 The Publication Director is Houzet Vincent hereinafter the 'Publisher'.

articles.title: THE HOST
articles.description: The Site host is the company OVH, whose head office is located at 2, rue Kellermann, 59100 Roubaix, with telephone number: 1007 + contact email address

articles.title: ACCESS TO THE SITE
articles.description: The Site is accessible anywhere, 7 days a week, 24 hours a day except in cases of force majeure or interruption scheduled or not and which may arise from a need for maintenance. In the event of modification, interruption or suspension of the Site, the Publisher cannot be held responsible.

articles.title: DATA COLLECTION
articles.description: The Site ensures that the User collects and processes personal information in compliance with privacy in accordance with law nÂ°78-17 of January 6, 1978 relating to computers, files and freedoms. Under the Data Protection Act, dated January 6, 1978, the User has a right of access, rectification, deletion and opposition of personal data. The user exercises this right: Â· by email to the email address contact@bim-dating.com Any use, reproduction, distribution, marketing, modification of all or part of the Site, without authorization from the Publisher is prohibited and may result in legal action and prosecution as provided in particular by the Intellectual Property Code and the Civil Code.

cookies.title: We respect your privacy
